title: The Yukon Trail - MECC - (Full Audio)
description:
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game
Platform.............: Windows 9x/ME/2000
More Info............: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Yukon_Trail
Compression Format...: RAR

The Yukon Trail

Developer	MECC
Publisher	MECC
Designer	MECC
Platform	Windows, System 7
Release date    1994
Genre   	Simulation, educational, strategy
Mode    	Single-player
Distribution	CD-ROM

This includes all of the audio that is missign in other versions of this game on the web. It also includes all the demos on disk.
There is no really good fix for playing this in x64. I advise you to install a Vitaul version of windows 98. I used Microsoft Virtual PC. Its not hard to find.
